Link Mash (September 25, 2014)

The weekly Link Mash is a curated selection of tools, stories, and other links that I found during my travels on the web. All of my links can be found on my Pinboard; you can also find the Link Mash archives here.

Sep 23, 2014

PinPress Updates with URL Linking

Last weekend, I updated PinPress – my command-line-based utility to create text templates of Pinboard data – with a (I think) much-needed feature: URL linking.

Sep 22, 2014 • ∞

→ Reigniting Passion in Technology

Today on the MailDeck blog, I wrote about our culture’s declining “technological passion” (that we build, but often without a drive other than the dollar) and what we might consider doing about it.
